job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-10T13:07:57.000Z", "description": "

ShortList Austin are working with a rapidly expanding Tech company that are looking to hire a Site Reliability Engineer (L2).


Responsibilities

  • Design, Build, Evolve and Operate SRE-owned services for the team.
  • Provide L2 support for Engineering and Development teams.
  • Offer improvements to existing service with the aim to provide self-service to customers.
  • Collaborate with Tech Leads on designs and advise on implementation.
  • Lower support/toil tasks utilizing automation.


The Ideal candidate

  • Produces clear designs and communicates them clearly to consumers.
  • Produces designs that improve performance/reliability.
  • Releases are automated, pass through CI/CD and SDLC and contain unit tests for critical components and performance thresholds.
  • Refactors critical production services with regular cadence, improving MTBI and MTTR.
  • Provides real-time visibility for the health of production services.
  • Standardizes use cases generating less measurable issues with releases.


The Ideal person

  • Results orientated.
  • Excellent attention to detail.
  • Able to prioritize effectively.
  • Able to communicate with Technical/non-technical people.
  • Able to escalate effectively when working on solutions.
  • Strong experience with distributed systems.


100% remote working available.


If this is a challenge you are interested in, hit APPLY NOW for immediate consideration.
